page.title: Sector Descriptions
page.t: Fear, panic, and chaos ensued at the discovery of this sector. What appears to be Xenon in nature is sending shockwaves of unrest throughout all civilized populations, and threatening to rend the chains forged during the Omicron Channel Symposium.

page.title: Litcube's Revelation
page.t:
[author][green]%s[/green][/author]FLASH %sZ

TO ALL REACHABLE PARTIES

OCV RECON ELEMENTS DETECTED IN [red]%s[/red].

ALL CIVILIAN CRAFTS AND GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS SHOULD REPORT
TO DESIGNATED EVACUATION ZONES AND AWAIT FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS.

TO ALL MILITARY FORCES AND CAPABLE CIVILIAN VOLUNTEERS:
ASSUME PRELUDE TO ASSAULT FROM %s.
VOLUNTEERS WILL BE STIPULATED PER OCV ELIMINATION.

[author][green]%s[/green][/author]FLASH %sZ

TO ALL REACHABLE PARTIES

OCV CRAFT HAVE ELIMINATED PRIMARY DEFENSIVE FORCES OVER [red]%s[/red].


CONTIGENCY PLAN IS NOW IN EFFECT. WITHDRAW ALL UNITS FROM [red]%s[/red] IMMEDIATELY AND RETURN TO NEARBY MILITARY OUTPOSTS AND SHIPYARDS FOR REFIT AND REPAIRS.

CIVILIANS ARE ADVISED TO VOLUNTEER TO SUPPORT DEFENSES IN THE CASE OF ANOTHER ATTACK.

STAND BY FOR FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS.

[author][green]%s[/green][/author]FLASH %sZ

TO ALL REACHABLE PARTIES

OCV INFASTRUCTURE ABOVE %s HAS BEEN CONFIRMED TO BE DESTROYED.

IMMEDIATE DISPATCH OF %s REGULAR MILITARY FORCES TO GARRISON %s HAS BEEN ISSUED.

VOLUNTEERS AND MERCENARIES HAVE BEEN STIPULATED AS PROPOSED.

GOOD WORK PEOPLE.

STAND BY FOR FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS.

[author][green]%s[/green][/author]FLASH %sZ

TO ALL REACHABLE PARTIES

RECON UNITS HAVE IDENTIFIED A TEMPORARY WEAKNESS IN %s OCV DEFENSES.

IMMEDIATE DISPATCH OF RAPID RESPONSE FORCE HAS BEEN ACTIVATED BUT REQUIRES ESCORT FROM VOLUNTEERS.

STRIKE FORCE IS MEETING IN %s SECTOR CENTER AND WILL JUMP to %s EXACTLY 10 MINUTES FROM THE DELIVERY OF THIS MESSAGE.

VOLUNTEERS AND MERCENARIES WILL STIPULATED AS PROPOSED.

STAND BY FOR FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS.

[author][green]%s[/green][/author]To private party %s:\n\nIt is with great honour that we present to you this award of %s for assisting in this latest military operation in sector %s. Your efforts have contributed to the eradication of the Omicron Channel Virus.

[author][green]Commonwealth[/green][/author]A new era has begun. Reports from all over the Universe confirm that the threat of the Omicron Channel Virus has been eliminated once and for all. Military mobilization will slowly return to normal levels in the coming weeks, and the lives of the Commonwealth can resume in the relative peaceful existence the Universe once was prior to the horrors exacted upon them by this most insidious and mysterious revelation.

[author][green]Galactic Empire[/green][/author]To all reachable parties:

As you may have already heard through various media channels within your respective homeworlds, it has become apparent that we are not alone in the Omicron Channel sectors. As of yesterday, scout ships in sector %s have reported sightings of what appear to be ships of Xenon and ancient terraformer make assembling within proximity to a Xenon station. While we are unclear of the intentions of this new entity, or if this possible threat is Xenon in nature, we would urge that all scheduled jumps and passage to Belkadan be restricted.

More information will be available as ExGal expedition teams continue to uncover the origins and intentions of this new entity.

page.title: Boardcomp. Sectornames
page.descr: Names of all sectors (spoken by Boardcomputer)
